reqs:
Pre-reqs: MICB 202. (and third-year standing.)
Questions about registration should be directed to Dr. Kion at tkion@mail.ubc.ca.
description: Cells, molecules, and mechanisms of innate and adaptive immunity. Antigen presenting cells and the major histocompatibility complex, T and B lymphocytes and their antigen receptors, T and B cell development, innate and adaptive immune responses against pathogens, diseases associated with aberrant immune responses.
